lead_paragraph: Three books offer stories of gangsters and good guys, including an inside look at the life of a Brooklyn-born officer who works under cover.

headline.print_headline: Little-Known Tales From the Crime Scene
headline.main: Little-Known Tales From New York’s Crime Scene

snippet: Three books offer stories of gangsters and good guys, including an inside look at the life of a Brooklyn-born officer who works under cover....
abstract: Sam Roberts reviews books Undisclosed Files of the Police: Cases From the Archives of the NYPD by Bernard J Whalen, Philip Messing and Robert Mladinich, Tong Wars: The Untold Story of Vice, Money and Murder in New York’s Chinatown by Scott D Seligman and Gunz and God: The Life of an NYPD Undercover by Stevie Stryker and Rocco Parascandola.
